sentence.Network_en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentence.Network_cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

sentence.Network_en: "I have never knowingly exposed any patient to needless risks," he said.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说：“我从未故意将任何病人置于不必要的风险境地。”

sentence.Network_en: Needless to say, theory and practice sometimes diverged.
sentence.Network_cn: 不用说，理论和实践有时候并不相符。

means.word_mean: 不需要的,不必要的,多余的

entry.def: Something that is needless is completely unnecessary.

example.ex: But his death was so needless...
example.tran: 但他的死太没有必要了。

example.ex: 'I have never knowingly exposed any patient to needless risks,' he said.
example.tran: 他说：“我从未故意将任何病人置于不必要的风险境地。”

entry.def: You use needless to say when you want to emphasize that what you are about to say is obvious and to be expected in the circumstances.

example.ex: Our budgie got out of its cage while our cat was in the room. Needless to say, the cat moved quicker than me and caught it.
example.tran: 我们的虎皮鹦鹉飞出鸟笼的时候，猫正好在室内。不用说，猫比我快，抓住了它。

sentences.sentence: "a strikers' tent camp...was burned with needless loss of life"

auth_sentence.content: Needless to say I found this a good read.
auth_sentence.res_content: Needless to say I found this a good read.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Needless to say I found this a good read.

auth_sentence.content: It was, needless to say, extremely unpleasant.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was, needless to say, extremely unpleasant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was, needless to say, extremely unpleasant.

auth_sentence.content: Needless to say, this was also a record.
auth_sentence.res_content: Needless to say, this was also a record.

sentences.en: It is needless to add that you are in want of a second.
sentences.cn: 你需要一个助手,那是不必说的。

sentences.en: Needless to say, the students who had studied mathematics before did better in the statistics exam.
sentences.cn: 不用说，以前学过数学的学生统计学考得比较好。

sentences.en: He got home from the party the next morning. Needless to say, his parents were furious.
sentences.cn: 他参加聚会第二天早晨才回家，不用说，他的父母大发雷霆。
